page.title: 01Our Block
page.content: {Our block lies in The Forest of Dean {and shows a typical cross section of {the type of area we live in.The main {population centres of Cinderford and {Littledean are surrounded by forest {which is carefully managed by The {Forestry Commission. Cinderford the largest settlement in the block is a town which grew in a hurry when mining in the area blossomed during the Industrial Revolution. At the moment the urban area is a scene of part dereliction where the mining an associated industries have died and part expansion where new industry is springing up.{In our text we describe {our history, opinions, things we do in {our spare time, visits to our Friday {market and police station and many {other thing which figure in our every {day lives.
